sentences.en: A delay of two hours did not dampen their enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 耽误了两小时没有减弱他们的热情。

sentences.en: Antonio has a contagious enthusiasm for the beautiful aspect of food.
sentences.cn: 安东尼奥对食品赏心悦目这一方面的热情非常有感染性。

sentences.en: Both his grandfathers were fired with an enthusiasm for public speaking.
sentences.cn: 他的祖父和外公都热衷于演说。

sentences.en: Gillian and Darren greeted the speakers with great enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 吉利恩和达伦非常热情地接待了演讲者。

sentences.en: He brought to the job not just considerable experience but passionate enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他不仅给这一工作带来了不少经验，而且倾注了极大的热情。

sentences.en: He had little but his enthusiasm to recommend him.
sentences.cn: 他拥有的优势只有他的热情。

sentences.en: He was praised for his enthusiasm and his open-mindedness.
sentences.cn: 人们称赞他的热情与开明。

sentences.en: I'm depressed by the bovine enthusiasm of the crowd's response.
sentences.cn: 人群毫无热情的迟钝反应使我感到很沮丧。

sentences.en: John will be best remembered for his drive and enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 约翰的魄力和热情最令人难忘。

sentences.en: Radford some-times allows his enthusiasm to run away with him.
sentences.cn: 雷德福有时会任由自己热情澎湃。

sentences.en: Self-discipline, willingness, enthusiasm, that's what you must depend on.
sentences.cn: 自律、自愿与热情，这是你所必须依仗的。

sentences.en: She radiates an infectious enthusiasm for everything she does.
sentences.cn: 她做任何事情都充满一种极富感染力的热情。

sentences.en: She wrinkled her nose, piqued by his total lack of enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 她皱皱鼻子，为他毫无热情而感到不快。

sentences.en: The early ambitions of youthful enthusiasm soon become tempered with realism.
sentences.cn: 之前年少时对理想抱负怀有的一腔热情很快便被现实浇灭。

sentences.en: The report had not been received with undiluted enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 这份报告并未收到热烈的反响。

sentences.en: There was a freshness and enthusiasm about the new students.
sentences.cn: 新生身上有一种朝气和热情。

sentences.en: They go about their tasks with little enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他们执行任务时没多大干劲。

sentences.en: University teachers generally have admitted a lack of enthusiasm about their subjects.
sentences.cn: 高校教师大体上承认对其所教专业缺乏热情。

sentences.en: We went along to the local diving club, full of enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 我们兴高采烈地去了当地的潜水俱乐部。

trans.tran_en: a strong feeling of interest and enjoyment about something and an eagerness to be involved in it
